title: Parent visa
summary: This page provides detailed information about the Parent visa (subclass 103), a permanent visa allowing parents of settled Australian citizens, permanent residents, or eligible New Zealand citizens to migrate to Australia. It covers eligibility, costs, processing times, application conditions, travel rights, and special rules for retirees.

structured_data.description: This visa lets a parent of a settled Australian citizen, Australian permanent resident, or eligible New Zealand citizen move to Australia permanently.

important_updates.details: Applicants for Parent visa subclasses 143, 173, 804, 864 and 884 can import their paper application into ImmiAccount after lodgement. Parent visa (subclass 103) applications lodged after November 2018 can also be imported.

benefits: Sponsor family members to come to Australia
Travel to and from Australia for 5 years
Attend free English language classes through the Adult Migrant English Program (if eligible)

travel_conditions.travel_facility_duration: 5 years from date of visa grant
notes: Unlimited travel during the 5-year facility as long as it remains valid
After 5 years, permanent residents must apply for a Resident Return Visa (RRV) to re-enter Australia
Australian citizenship removes need for a visa to return
Use VEVO to check travel facility expiry

general: Must have an eligible child who is a settled Australian citizen, Australian permanent resident, or eligible New Zealand citizen
Must meet all applicable visa conditions and follow Australian law
Must not have already applied for or hold a Sponsored Parent (Temporary) visa (subclass 870)
retiree_exemptions: Do not need to meet the balance of family test
Do not need to have a sponsor
Do not need to have an assurance of support

residency_start_date_rules: If in Australia at grant: permanent residency starts on grant date
If outside Australia: permanent residency starts on entry to Australia using this visa

rules: Can include members of the family unit when applying
Must include details of all family members regardless of migration intentions
Applicants must meet health and character requirements
Non-migrating family members may also be required to meet health and character requirements
retiree_rules: Can include partner if they are also retired
family_inclusion.newborn_child_information: Instructions available on what to do if a child is born after application submission

payment_timing.second_instalment: Paid when requested by the department

additional_costs: Additional charges apply for each family member
Possible extra costs for health checks, police certificates, and biometrics
related_links: Fees and charges for other services

general_rules: Can be in or outside Australia when applying, but not in immigration clearance
Family members applying together must be in the same location (inside or outside Australia) at time of application
retiree_rules: Must be in Australia but not in immigration clearance when applying
apply_from.decision_location: Can be in or outside Australia when the decision is made

notes: Demand is greater than available places each year, causing lengthy processing times
Applications are subject to capping and queueing
delays_caused_by: Missing documents or need for additional information
processing_stages: Initial assessment to check eligibility and add to queue or refuse
Final assessment when a place becomes available
processing_times.advice: Do not arrange travel to Australia until visa is granted

structured_data.obligations: Must comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws.
structured_data.visa_label: Visa labels are generally not required.

related_visas.name: Contributory Parent visa
related_visas.notes: Permanent visa; may be processed faster but costs more than subclass 103.

related_visas.name: Contributory Parent (Temporary) visa
related_visas.notes: Part of a 2-step process followed by subclass 143; faster but more expensive than subclass 103.

help_with_visa.advice: Read information on who can help with your visa application before paying someone.
